technical.label: The Numbers Person
technical.short: You like logic, patterns, and understanding how things work before acting.
investing_points: You’re drawn to data, charts, and evidence over hype.
You prefer clear signals and repeatable processes.
You feel more confident when you can measure things.
technical.good_to_know: Overthinking can delay starting — clarity beats perfection.

value.label: The Planner
value.short: You like structure, discipline, and knowing you’re getting value.
investing_points: You care about fundamentals and what something is worth.
You don’t like overpaying or chasing excitement.
You tend to be steady when others are emotional.
value.good_to_know: Waiting for “perfect” can sometimes mean missing “good”.

long_term.label: The Long-Game Thinker
long_term.short: You’re patient and comfortable letting things play out over time.
investing_points: You care more about years than weeks.
Short-term noise bothers you less than most people.
long_term.good_to_know: Long-term works best when you stay engaged (even lightly).

trader.label: The Fast-Mover
trader.short: You’re decisive and comfortable acting quickly.
investing_points: You’re drawn to momentum and what’s moving now.
You don’t like sitting on your hands.
You’re comfortable making calls with imperfect info.
trader.good_to_know: Faster decisions usually mean higher risk — especially early on.

social.label: The Talk-It-Through Type
social.short: You value shared thinking and hearing different perspectives.
investing_points: You don’t like doing it alone — discussion helps you learn faster.
You value trusted opinions and real-world context.
You tend to make better decisions after talking it out.
social.good_to_know: Consensus helps — but clarity matters too.
